title: Musk Offers $43 Billion in Cash to Take Twitter Private
itunes:title: Musk Offers $43 Billion in Cash to Take Twitter Private
description:
Bloomberg News West Coast Correspondent Ed Ludlow and Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Technology Analyst Mandeep Singh discuss Elon Musk’s controversial offer to buy Twitter. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Auto Reporter Keith Naughton share the details of Keith's Businessweek Magazine cover story Ford Turns America’s Favorite Truck Into Test of Tesla Dominance. Bloomberg Economics Senior U.S. Economist Yelena Shulyatyeva reports on the U.S. auto outlook from the New York Auto Show. Dr. Len Rubenstein, Director of the Program on Human Rights, Health and Conflict at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, talks about the vulnerability of health care in times of conflict. And we Drive to the Close with David Dietze, Senior Portfolio Strategist at Peapack Private Wealth Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
